My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and web development projects begin and end with a comprehensive process with deep involvement of the client to consistently meet expectations

1

Plan and Discuss

Assess the needs, potential audiences and design choices for a project with the client

2

Brainstorming

Create a plan with more specific, practical applications of desired themes, design and ideas

3

UI/UX Planning

Canvas a rough potential UI code structure with front and (if necessary) back-end plans

4

Code and Deploy

Finish project with quality assurance testing, security implementation and check with client before deployment
